CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper August 30, 1947, pg. 22, reads: "Curtaineers Confer - Pictured here are some of the members of the IKS Curtaineers Committee discussing plans for the fall season which begins Sept. 1. Left to right, are: Samuel Levine, out-going director of Irene Kaufmann Settlement; Simon Gerson, Margaret Murray, Rose Mukerji and Robert Murray. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Members of Curtaineers drama group committee: Irene Kaufmann Settlement director Samuel Levine, Simon Gerson, Margaret Murray, Rose Mukerji, and Robert Murray posed in interior with brick fireplace with trophies on mantel
